"Mining Rig Defense: Aelio":
"\"Mining Rig Defense: Aelio\" is an Emergency Quest in which you protect Resource Mining Rigs from enemy attack.

As with other Emergency Quests, occurrences will be announced in advance, and a start point will be displayed on the World Map."

"Enemies come intermittently in \"Waves\". Your objective, and that of your fellow players, is to protect the Rigs long enough to survive the final Wave.

The Resource Mining Rigs' remaining durability determines your rank for clearing the Quest, but does not affect the reward items you receive."
